name: Mocean Tool
semantic_context: Send SMS and voice messages via Mocean
natural_language_description: 这是 Mocean Tool 节点。主要用于: Send SMS and voice messages via Mocean

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Send SMS and voice messages via Mocean
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Send SMS and voice messages via Mocean | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: send

from.name: from
from.description: Number to which to send the message
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: Number to which to send the message | (必填项)

to.name: to
to.description: Number from which to send the message
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: Number from which to send the message | (必填项)

language.name: language
language.natural_language_description: 参数名: Language | 默认值: en-US

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Message to send | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
